--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Firestrike steps forward as he waits for Perceptor to come through 
> the door into the control room.  He stands to the side of the 
door.  
> "Will reprogrammation be needed on this one?" he asks calmly but 
> loyaly.
